description: This script manages the restart and configuration of 5G hotspot interfaces on a device. It terminates existing hostapd processes, reloads modules, restarts hostapd instances with configuration files, and conditionally controls network interfaces based on hotspot enable status, as specified by device configuration and system state.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts hostapd processes for 5G interface, reloads kernel modules, and restarts hostapd daemon with configuration files.
